Literature Review: Label-free electrochemical methods have revolutionized the field of disease detection, offering a cost-effective and user-friendly approach to analytical chemistry. These methods leverage the advantages of label-free techniques, including low cost, fewer user steps, and high sensitivity. In this review, we will discuss four label-free electrochemical biosensing mechanisms, recent advancements, and relative advantages and disadvantages of the techniques. We will also examine two avenues for gaining further diagnostic information from label-free electrochemical biosensors, through multiplex analysis and incorporating machine learning.
